participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and resilient, with a love for family and crafts.
participant_1.background: i do not have a smartphone. i've amazing children and grandchildren. i am retired and living the great life. i can sew my own clothes. i had cancer but its gone now.

participant_2.name: Kevin
participant_2.personality: Introverted and innovative, with a passion for technology and gaming.
participant_2.background: i helped design the game starcraft. i am a recluse. i am working on building a robot to be my body double. i am a famous twitch streamer.
